title: Spotify can't override Pixel 5's Do Not Disturb mode
content:
Spotify (or any other music app like YT Music) can not override the Do Not Disturb mode from the Google Pixel 5.

The Playback option (Do Not Disturb / Apps Spotify Playback) is enabled and overrides the DND, but that doesn't work.

As soon as you enable the Media sounds option (Do Not Disturb / Alarms & other terruptions / Media sounds), it works fine.

Does this works as designed or is it a bug? ;)
Maybe someone (me) wants to set the Pixel 5 in DND and wants to be not interrupted by any app but Spotify...

Thanks in advance!
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 5
